svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2020-05-17T20:19:19.926Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Safari/537.36" etag="kshbWlUmi8E6mg5Yn6jQ" version="13.1.2" type="google"><diagram name="Page-1" id="edf60f1a-56cd-e834-aa8a-f176f3a09ee4"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 311px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: create neuron list L which contains N neurons with their ID and neuron type class

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 30px; margin-left: 161px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: initialize connectome W as N by N zero matrix

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 90px; margin-left: 295px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 268px; height: 1px; padding-top: 175px; margin-left: 161px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
set W[x,y] = 1
x is the ID of presynapse neuron
y is the ID of postsynapse neuron
(only consider neurons in L)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 260px; margin-left: 241px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: store neuron list L and connectome W in two CSV filesÂ

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 175px; margin-left: 1px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
all the synapses for the simulation
(we don't need input synapses file in simulation)

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
